subject: Track and Field
World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The tiny Persian Gulf nation, also the site for soccer’s World Cup in 2022, will host the event in Doha, which was picked ahead of Barcelona, Spain, and Eugene, Ore.
snippet: The tiny Persian Gulf nation, also the site for soccer’s World Cup in 2022, will host the event in Doha, which was picked ahead of Barcelona, Spain, and Eugene, Ore.
